messages.speech:
Getting started in eFolio is not complicated. This online tutorial will walk you through the most common “getting started” procedures:

      1.  Designing your site

      2.  Adding content

      3.  Inserting content into to your efolio webpages

To learn more about adding content to your eFolio, click on the link below:

       - Online Tutorial for Adding Content to Your eFolio (5 1/2 Minute Presentation)
         https://umconnect.umn.edu/efoliobeginningsteps/
